work.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Designing and implementing a REST API in Node.js using TypeScript
Enforcing TDD using Clean Architecture for maintainable and testable code
Implementing UI designs using React and its ecosystem
Constructing and executing state-based database development in Microsoft SQL Server

work.title: Developer Intern
descriptions: Implemented UI using Vue to provide a better user experience for the users.
Made use of event-driven architecture using RabbitMQ and Celery to produce and consume data.

projects.name: GymArc
projects.description: A cross-platform workout tracking app that is designed to provide a better user experience for gym-goers. It allows users to track their progress and share their workouts with others.

projects.name: MediPort
projects.description: A medical passport mobile application that provides users a convenient way to store their medical information. It allows users to also track their prescriptions and medical appointments.

projects.name: GoCreate Badge Designer
projects.description: A project that I built in my free time for a previous employer. It allowed staff to quickly collect member photos and information and construct it into a badge.

projects.name: Inventory System
projects.description: A command line application that allows users to manage their inventory. It allows users to add, remove, and update items in their inventory. This was one of my first projects that I built when I was first learning how to code.
